title: The Awkward Debate Over NYC Marathon’s Antidoping Policy
description: A policy that has come under scrutiny since the organization behind the New York City Marathon learned its incoming chairwoman cannot compete in its races may be illegal. It’s all quite awkward.
dc:creator: Matthew Futterman
media:description: Nnenna Lynch in 2016. In June, N.Y.R.R. tapped her to chair the board beginning in June 2023.
